languages.text: {n}На лице человека застыла жестокая гримаса, а руки обезображены следами ожогов. За его спиной — жуткого вида механизм с отполированным до блеска черепом гигантских размеров. Оплавленные глазницы мрачно взирают на толпу в обещании неминуемой кары. Мужчина — очевидно, палач — склоняет голову.{/n} "Сами посланники небес явились вершить судьбы. Это честь для нас, Звездное Сиятельство".
languages.translation_comment: сделать кровавый след, ведущий к железному мученику

traits.locale_text: {n}На помосте возвышается массивный человек в алой маске. Его руки обезображены следами ожогов. За его плечами — гигантский железный гроб с ликом святого. Пламя лижет оплавленные глазницы и рот, застывший в беззвучном крике.{/n}

{n}На лице человека застыла жестокая гримаса, а руки обезображены следами ожогов. За его спиной — жуткого вида механизм с отполированным до блеска черепом гигантских размеров. Мужчина — очевидно, палач — склоняет голову.{/n} "Сами посланники небес явились вершить судьбы. Это честь для нас, Звездное Сиятельство".

languages.translation_comment: сделать кровавый след, ведущий к железному мученику

languages.text: {n}You see a man with a cruel grimace on his face and hands disfigured with burn marks. Behind him stands a ghastly looking mechanism adorned with a polished skull of gigantic proportions. The eye sockets, their edges melted, gaze darkly at the crowd with the promise of inevitable punishment. The man, clearly the executioner, bows his head.{/n} "The very messengers of the sky have come to decide our fate. We are honoured, Your Celestial Highness."
languages.original_text: {n}На лице человека застыла жестокая гримаса, а руки обезображены следами ожогов. За его спиной — жуткого вида механизм с отполированным до блеска черепом гигантских размеров. Оплавленные глазницы мрачно взирают на толпу в обещании неминуемой кары. Мужчина — очевидно, палач — склоняет голову.{/n} "Сами посланники небес явились вершить судьбы. Это честь для нас, Звездное Сиятельство".

traits.locale_text: {n}You see a man with a cruel grimace on his face and hands disfigured with burn marks. Behind him stands a ghastly-looking mechanism adorned with a polished skull of gigantic proportions. The eye sockets, their edges melted, gaze darkly at the crowd with the promise of inevitable punishment. The man, clearly the executioner, bows his head.{/n} "The very messengers of the sky have come to decide our fate. We are honoured, Your Celestial Highness."

{n}The man has a cruel grimace on his face and his hands are disfigured with burn marks. Behind him is a ghastly-looking iron casket bearing the likeness of a saint. Flames lick the smouldering eye sockets and the mouth, fixed in a silent scream. The man, obviously the executioner, bows his head.{/n} "The very messengers of the sky have come to decide our fate. We are honoured, Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}."

The man, clearly the executioner, bows his head.{/n} "The very messengers of the sky have come to decide our fate. We are honoured, Your Celestial Highness."

languages.text: {n}眼前的男人满脸残忍之相，双手满是烧焦的痕迹，扭曲不堪。他身后竖立着一具阴森可怖的刑具，上面装饰着一颗巨大的抛光头骨。头骨眼窝的边缘已经熔化，黑洞洞的眼窝凝视着人群，昭示着必将到来的惩罚。很显然，这个人是刽子手。他看到你之后，低下了头。{/n}“天空的使者亲自前来决定我们的命运，我们感到无比殊荣，来自上界的大人。”
languages.original_text: {n}You see a man with a cruel grimace on his face and hands disfigured with burn marks. Behind him stands a ghastly looking mechanism adorned with a polished skull of gigantic proportions. The eye sockets, their edges melted, gaze darkly at the crowd with the promise of inevitable punishment. The man, clearly the executioner, bows his head.{/n} "The very messengers of the sky have come to decide our fate. We are honoured, Your Celestial Highness."

traits.locale_text: {n}眼前的男人满脸残忍之相，双手满是烧焦的痕迹，扭曲不堪。他身后竖立着一具阴森可怖的刑具，上面装饰着一颗巨大的抛光头骨。头骨眼窝的边缘已经熔化，黑洞洞的眼窝凝视着人群，昭示着必将到来的惩罚。很显然，这个人是刽子手。他看到你之后，低下了头。{/n}“天空的使者亲自前来决定我们的命运，我们感到无比殊荣，来自上界的大人。”
{n}眼前的男人满脸残忍之相，双手满是烧焦的痕迹，扭曲不堪。他身后竖立着一具阴森可怖的刑具，如同圣人的塑像。烈焰舔舐着刑具闷燃的眼窝和嘴巴，圣人的塑像仿佛发出了无声的尖叫。很显然，这个人是刽子手。他看到你之后，低下了头。{/n}“天空的使者亲自前来决定我们的命运，我们感到无比殊荣，来自上界的大人。”

languages.text: {n}Ves a un hombre de rostro cruel con las manos desfiguradas por diversas quemaduras. Detrás de él hay un mecanismo de aspecto macabro decorado con un cráneo bruñido de proporciones gargantuescas. Las cuencas de sus ojos tienen los bordes fundidos y escrutan en silencio a la muchedumbre con la promesa de un castigo ineludible. El hombre, que evidentemente es el verdugo, inclina la cabeza.{/n} «Los mismísimos mensajeros del cielo han acudido para decidir nuestro destino. Su presencia nos honra, Excelencia Celestial».
languages.original_text: {n}You see a man with a cruel grimace on his face and hands disfigured with burn marks. Behind him stands a ghastly looking mechanism adorned with a polished skull of gigantic proportions. The eye sockets, their edges melted, gaze darkly at the crowd with the promise of inevitable punishment. The man, clearly the executioner, bows his head.{/n} "The very messengers of the sky have come to decide our fate. We are honoured, Your Celestial Highness."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ves a un hombre de rostro cruel con las manos desfiguradas por diversas quemaduras. Detrás de él hay un mecanismo de aspecto macabro decorado con un cráneo bruñido de proporciones gargantuescas. Las cuencas de sus ojos tienen los bordes fundidos y escrutan en silencio a la muchedumbre con la promesa de un castigo ineludible. El hombre, que evidentemente es el verdugo, inclina la cabeza.{/n} «Los mismísimos mensajeros del cielo han acudido para decidir nuestro destino. Su presencia nos honra, Excelencia Celestial».

{n}Ves a un hombre de rostro cruel con las manos desfiguradas por diversas quemaduras. Detrás de él hay un mecanismo de hierro de aspecto macabro tallado con la efigie de un santo. Asoman llamas por los agujeros de los ojos y la boca, congelada en un grito silencioso. El hombre, que evidentemente es el verdugo, inclina la cabeza.{/n} «Los mismísimos mensajeros del cielo han acudido para decidir nuestro destino. Su presencia nos honra, Excelencia Celestial».

languages.text: {n}Yüzünde zalimce bir sırıtış olan, elleri yanık izleriyle biçimsizleşmiş bir adam görüyorsun. Arkasında devasa ve cilalı bir kafatasıyla süslenmiş, korkunç görünümlü bir mekanizma duruyor. Kenarları erimiş olan göz çukurları, kaçınılmaz bir ceza vaadiyle kalabalığa karanlık bir şekilde bakıyor. Açıkça cellat olan adam başını eğiyor.{/n} "Semanın habercilerinin ta kendileri kaderimizi belirlemeye gelmiş. Onur duyduk Semavi Efendimiz."
languages.original_text: {n}You see a man with a cruel grimace on his face and hands disfigured with burn marks. Behind him stands a ghastly looking mechanism adorned with a polished skull of gigantic proportions. The eye sockets, their edges melted, gaze darkly at the crowd with the promise of inevitable punishment. The man, clearly the executioner, bows his head.{/n} "The very messengers of the sky have come to decide our fate. We are honoured, Your Celestial Highness."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yüzünde zalimce bir sırıtış olan, elleri yanık izleriyle biçimsizleşmiş bir adam görüyorsun. Arkasında devasa ve cilalı bir kafatasıyla süslenmiş, korkunç görünümlü bir mekanizma duruyor. Kenarları erimiş olan göz çukurları, kaçınılmaz bir ceza vaadiyle kalabalığa karanlık bir şekilde bakıyor. Açıkça cellat olan adam başını eğiyor.{/n} "Semanın habercilerinin ta kendileri kaderimizi belirlemeye gelmiş. Onur duyduk Semavi Efendimiz."

{n}Yüzünde zalimce bir sırıtış olan, elleri yanık izleriyle biçimsizleşmiş bir adam görüyorsun. Arkasında bir azize benzeyen, korkunç görünümlü demir bir mekanizma duruyor. Alevler, için için yanan göz çukurlarını ve sessiz bir çığlıkta sabitlenmiş ağzı yalıyor. Açıkça cellat olan adam başını eğiyor.{/n} "Semanın habercilerinin ta kendileri kaderimizi belirlemeye gelmiş. Onur duyduk Semavi Efendimiz."

languages.text: {n}顔に残酷な渋面を浮かべ、火傷で醜くなった手を持つ男に会う。彼の背後には、不気味な機械がそびえ立っていた。そこには巨大な頭蓋骨が磨かれて飾られていて、溶けかけたような縁を持つ眼窩が群衆を暗く見下ろし、避けがたい罰を予告していた。その男は、明らかに処刑人であり、お辞儀する。{/n}「天の使者が我々の運命を決めるために来られた。天の閣下、大変光栄です」
languages.original_text: {n}You see a man with a cruel grimace on his face and hands disfigured with burn marks. Behind him stands a ghastly looking mechanism adorned with a polished skull of gigantic proportions. The eye sockets, their edges melted, gaze darkly at the crowd with the promise of inevitable punishment. The man, clearly the executioner, bows his head.{/n} "The very messengers of the sky have come to decide our fate. We are honoured, Your Celestial Highness."

traits.locale_text: {n}顔に残酷な渋面を浮かべ、火傷で醜くなった手を持つ男に会う。彼の背後には、不気味な機械がそびえ立っていた。そこには巨大な頭蓋骨が磨かれて飾られていて、溶けかけたような縁を持つ眼窩が群衆を暗く見下ろし、避けがたい罰を予告していた。その男は、明らかに処刑人であり、お辞儀する。{/n}「天の使者が我々の運命を決めるために来られた。天の閣下、大変光栄です」

languages.text: {n}Vous apercevez un homme arborant une grimace cruelle et des mains déformées par des marques de brûlure. Derrière lui se trouve un mécanisme à l'allure sinistre, orné d'un immense crâne poli. Les orbites aux bordures fondues portent un regard lugubre sur la foule, évoquant un inévitable châtiment. L'homme, qui de toute évidence n'est autre que le bourreau, vous salue d'un hochement de tête.{/n} « Les messagers du ciel en personne sont venus pour décider de notre sort. C'est un grand honneur pour nous, Votre Altesse Célestissime. »
languages.original_text: {n}You see a man with a cruel grimace on his face and hands disfigured with burn marks. Behind him stands a ghastly looking mechanism adorned with a polished skull of gigantic proportions. The eye sockets, their edges melted, gaze darkly at the crowd with the promise of inevitable punishment. The man, clearly the executioner, bows his head.{/n} "The very messengers of the sky have come to decide our fate. We are honoured, Your Celestial Highness."

Derrière lui se trouve un mécanisme à l'allure sinistre, orné d'un immense crâne poli. Les orbites aux bordures fondues portent un regard lugubre sur la foule, évoquant un inévitable châtiment. C'est un grand honneur pour nous, Votre Altesse Célestissime. »

{n}Vous apercevez un homme arborant une grimace cruelle et des mains défigurées par des marques de brûlure. Derrière lui se dresse un mécanisme de fer à l'allure sinistre, sculpté à l'effigie d'un saint. Des flammes viennent lécher ses orbites fumantes et sa bouche figée en un cri silencieux. L'homme, qui de toute évidence n'est autre que le bourreau, vous salue d'un hochement de tête.{/n} « Les messagers du ciel en personne sont venus pour décider de notre sort. C'est un grand honneur pour nous, Votre Altesse Célestissime. »

languages.text: {n}Du siehst einen Mann mit einer grausamen Grimasse als Gesicht und von Verbrennungen entstellten Händen. Hinter ihm steht ein unheilvoller Mechanismus mit einem riesigen polierten Schädel. Die Augenhöhlen blicken düster auf die Menge und versprechen eine unvermeidliche Bestrafung. Der Mann, offensichtlich der Henker, neigt den Kopf.{/n} "Die Boten des Himmels selbst sind gekommen, um über unser Schicksal zu entscheiden. Es ist uns eine Ehre, Eure himmlische Hoheit."
languages.original_text: {n}You see a man with a cruel grimace on his face and hands disfigured with burn marks. Behind him stands a ghastly looking mechanism adorned with a polished skull of gigantic proportions. The eye sockets, their edges melted, gaze darkly at the crowd with the promise of inevitable punishment. The man, clearly the executioner, bows his head.{/n} "The very messengers of the sky have come to decide our fate. We are honoured, Your Celestial Highness."

traits.locale_text: {n}Du siehst einen Mann mit einer grausamen Grimasse als Gesicht und von Verbrennungen entstellten Händen. Hinter ihm steht ein unheilvoller Mechanismus mit einem riesigen polierten Schädel. Die Augenhöhlen blicken düster auf die Menge und versprechen eine unvermeidliche Bestrafung. Der Mann, offensichtlich der Henker, neigt den Kopf.{/n} "Die Boten des Himmels selbst sind gekommen, um über unser Schicksal zu entscheiden. Es ist uns eine Ehre, Eure himmlische Hoheit."

{n}Du siehst einen Mann mit einer grausamen Grimasse als Gesicht und von Verbrennungen entstellten Händen. Hinter ihm steht ein grauenhaft anmutender eiserner Mechanismus, den das Bild eines Heiligen ziert. Flammen züngeln um die qualmenden Augenhöhlen und den Mund, der zu einem stummen Schrei erstarrt ist. Der Mann, offenbar der Henker, neigt den Kopf.{/n}"Die Boten des Himmels selbst sind gekommen, um über unser Schicksal zu entscheiden. Es ist uns eine Ehre, Eure himmlische Hoheit."
